p: This study compares the toxicity of 25 essential oils on the granary weevil. Sixteen of these were found to have an interesting insecticidal activity on S. granarius. Our results show that A. sativum, G. procumbens, O. sanctum, M. arvensis, T. vulgaris (geraniol) and E. dives present a potential to control S. granarius population directly in the grain.
